thread.title: Justin Bieber mocks The Weeknd again on Instagram chat | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber mocks The Weeknd again on Instagram chat | Daily Mail Online

author: Paul Chavez For Dailymail.Com
title: Justin Bieber mocks The Weeknd again on Instagram chat | Daily Mail Online
text: 244 shares 'We gotta end it now. That was too funny,' Justin said. Justin was nominated for a Grammy Award for his single Love Yourself, but skipped the annual awards ceremony at the downtown Staples Center where The Weeknd performed. Awards performance: The Weeknd performed Sunday at The Grammy Awards held at Staples Center in Los Angeles He informed fans that he was instead headed out for a sushi dinner in Los Angeles. Justin and Selena, 24, dated off and on from late 2010 until 2014 and briefly lived together. Selena and The Weeknd, 26, started dating recently and were spotted last month kissing outside an Italian restaurant in Santa Monica, California. Good times: Selena Gomez, shown on Instagram, was all smiles at a Grammys after party hosted by Rihanna that she attended with The Weeknd They've since enjoyed a luxurious romantic getaway together in Venice, Italy. Selena and The Weeknd, real name Abel Makkonen Tesfaye, after the Grammys attended Rihanna's after party together at 1OAK in Los Angeles. Justin, who is an Ontario native, last month also took a swipe at The Weeknd, who also hails from Ontario. Former couple: Justin and Selena are shown in November 2011 at the American Music Awards in Los Angeles The Sorry singer was asked by TMZ last month if he'd listen to a song by The Weeknd. 'Hell no I can't listen to a Weeknd song, that's just wack,' Justin replied. Justin and The Weeknd both rose to fame after posting videos of their music on YouTube. Busy star: Selena is shown last week in New York City promoting the upcoming Netflix series 13 Reasons Why in which she's an executive producer
